title: no one response Support ticket
body: Hi is there anyone can read my ticket? I submit these ticket one days ago, no one read it or try to fix it. I should get the 4 win ip boost after I verify my email address, but until now, I have not get it.

replies.body: Thanks for reply, some staff have already take care of it.

A specialist will definitely read your ticket, but you'll need to be a bit more patient. The end of a ranked season often causes a lot of support tickets to get submitted, so we're a little backlogged right now. We'll have a specialist get back to you as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have any questions.
